stations.name: Christmas Rocks!
stations.description: Have your self an indie/alternative holiday season!

stations.name: Christmas Lounge
stations.description: Chilled holiday grooves and classic winter lounge tracks. (Kid and Parent safe!)

stations.name: Xmas in Frisko (holiday)
stations.description: SomaFM's wacky and eclectic holiday mix. Not for the easily offended.

stations.name: Groove Salad (ambient/electronica)
stations.description: A nicely chilled plate of ambient/downtempo beats and grooves.

stations.name: Lush (electronica)
stations.description: Sensuous and mellow vocals mostly female with an electronic influence.

stations.name: Earwaves (experimental)
stations.description: Spanning the history of electronic and experimental music from the early pioneers to the latest innovators.

stations.name: Deep Space One (ambient)
stations.description: Deep ambient electronic experimental and space music. A soundtrack for inner and outer space exploration.

stations.name: Drone Zone (ambient)
stations.description: Served best chilled safe with most medications. Atmospheric textures with minimal beats.

stations.name: PopTron (alternative)
stations.description: Electropop and indie dance rock with sparkle and pop.

stations.name: DEF CON Radio (specials)
stations.description: Music for Hacking. From DEF CON 21 in Las Vegas.

stations.name: Dub Step Beyond (electronica)
stations.description: Dubstep Dub and Deep Bass. May damage speakers at high volume.

stations.name: Space Station Soma (electronica)
stations.description: Tune in turn on space out. Spaced-out ambient and mid-tempo electronica.

stations.name: Mission Control (ambient/electronica)
stations.description: Celebrating NASA and Space Explorers everywhere.

stations.name: Indie Pop Rocks! (alternative)
stations.description: New and classic favorite indie pop tracks.

stations.name: Folk Forward (folk/alternative)
stations.description: Indie Folk Alt-folk and the occasional folk classics.

stations.name: BAGeL Radio (alternative)
stations.description: What alternative rock radio should sound like.

stations.name: Digitalis (electronica/alternative)
stations.description: Digitally affected analog rock to calm the agitated heart.

stations.name: Sonic Universe (jazz)
stations.description: Transcending the world of jazz with eclectic avant-garde takes on tradition.

stations.name: Secret Agent (lounge)
stations.description: The soundtrack for your stylish mysterious dangerous life. For Spies and PIs too!

stations.name: Suburbs of Goa (world)
stations.description: Desi-influenced Asian world beats and beyond.

stations.name: Boot Liquor (americana)
stations.description: Americana Roots music for Cowhands Cowpokes and Cowtippers

stations.name: Illinois Street Lounge (lounge)
stations.description: Classic bachelor pad playful exotica and vintage music of tomorrow.

stations.name: The Trip (electronica)
stations.description: Progressive house/trance. Tip top tunes.

stations.name: cliqhop idm (electronica)
stations.description: Blips'n'beeps backed mostly w/beats. Intelligent Dance Music.

stations.name: Iceland Airwaves (alternative)
stations.description: Music from bands who will be performing at Iceland Airwaves [explicit]

stations.name: Covers (eclectic)
stations.description: Just covers. Songs you know by artists you don't. We've got you covered.

stations.name: Underground 80s (alternative/electronica)
stations.description: Early 80s UK Synthpop and a bit of New Wave.

stations.name: Beat Blender (electronica)
stations.description: A late night blend of deep-house and downtempo chill.

stations.name: Doomed (ambient/industrial)
stations.description: Dark industrial/ambient music for tortured souls.

stations.name: Black Rock FM (eclectic)
stations.description: From the Playa to the world for the 2013 Burning Man festival

stations.name: SF 10-33 (ambient/news)
stations.description: Ambient music mixed with the sounds of San Francisco public safety radio traffic.
